title: Lester Beall poster reprints
content:
Hello all,

I'm a big fan of Lester Beall's Rural Electrification posters from the WPA period.

Does anyone know where you can find reprints of these?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2006_1375_5789.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/9048b3037899a3dd294352f49b4a809f1a2cb410_m_5831.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/h2_RL_3507.2001.1.3.jpg)
author: jmickel

comments.content:
1) search for them here:

[http://lcweb2.loc.gov/pp/wpaposquery.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102124/http:/lcweb2.loc.gov/pp/wpaposquery.html "http://lcweb2.loc.gov/pp/wpaposquery.html")

2) download

3) print!

Unfortunately, the high-res versions aren't always THAT high-res, but most are pretty good with a bit of photoshop tweaking.

Looks like they're constantly updating it with more and more posters as well...really like this one:

[http://memory.loc.gov/service/pnp/cph/3f00000/3f05000/3f05400/3f05439r.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102124/http:/memory.loc.gov/service/pnp/cph/3f00000/3f05000/3f05400/3f05439r.jpg "http://memory.loc.gov/service/pnp/cph/3f00000/3f05000/3f05400/3f05439r.jpg")
JLM - did anything come of this? i am also very interested in reproductions of these posters.
